title: Final Recap: Japanese Fairy Tales [Spoiler Alert]
description:
Elizabeth recaps the ending of our last Japanese Fairy Tale, "Momotaro, or the Story of the Son of a Peach" by Yei Theodora Ozaki.


Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.
